entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Comox Airport 11:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Light Rainshower
Temperature: 3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 2.5°C
Wind: SE 30 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening. A few flurries and rain showers beginning near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries and rain showers changing to rain showers in the morning. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023
